Name: Sakura Day Mahjong
About the game: Travel around mysterious Asia! Visit the lost Wind Valley. Gaze into the waters of the magical Emerald Waterfall and donâ€™t get lost in the Imperial Garden. Assemble Mahjong puzzles to suit any taste. Classic, themed, blitz fast levels for points to save time, huge levels of 200 tiles for a long journey and tall, 15-layer levels to challenge your skills! Over 7 hours of gameplay in 120 unique levels await you in 6 wonderful unexplored worlds and exciting landscapes from Asia. Each level has its own individual goals, and the levels themselves contain special golden tiles. -Over 100 exciting levels. -Special abilities and golden tiles. -Mahjong that you can take anywhere!
